name: LOOT BOX ACHIEVEMENT SIMULATOR
description: Do you love to spend money in order to buy loot boxes that are filled with crappy items? NO, OF COURSE NOT! With LOOT BOX ACHIEVEMENT SIMULATOR you can open as many achievement packed loot boxes as you want while finishing easy, funny and very questionable click quests.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: No specific requirement as the graphics are pretty basic. Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Yes, please.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: The fastesterest and strongestest graphic card in existence will work beter than the worst. Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Yes, pretty please.
